#summary Details on getFieldsNamesForItemAuction() API function
#sidebar ApiFunctions

Call this function to get a list of fields name you can use to handle an auction item


=== Call ===

 * syntax : getFieldsNamesForItemAuction()

=== Response ===

 * response : _array_ : the immediate response is always an array of 2 elements
  * element 1 : _boolean_ : true (if call ok) or false (if call not ok)
  * element 2 : 
   * if call ok : _array_ : list of fields name you can use to handle an auction item
   * if call not ok : _string_ : error message

 * notification : none

=== Code example (PHP) ===
{{{
//FUNCTION CALL
$objSoapClient = new SoapClient('http://api.delcampe.net/soap.php?wsdl');
$return = $objSoapClient->getFieldsNamesForItemAuction();
  if ($return[0] === true) {
    var_export($return[1], 1);
  } else {
    echo 'Function call failed. Error message : ' . $return[1]; 
  }
}}}
